children.text: After setting up a password, you will need to enter the password when the app starts.
When configured、you will receive a notification 3 or 7 days before menstruation.
When configured、you will receive a notification 3 days before ovulation.
After setting up a Twitter ID and password, you will be able to post schedule and memo on Twitter.
Set up first day of week
You are able to select the first data of the week in a monthly calendar.
When you close app by tapping a “back” key on your device, confirmation screen can be displayed.
Able to select languages for this app.
Features that make the app more convenient can be added.
If you are pregnant, you can manage your pregnancy by using maternity mode.
You can view the record from maternity mode.
